messages.title: Election race latest
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour here. It's between John Leech or Labour in south Manchester.

messages.title: A better deal for our heroes in uniform
messages.content: Lib Dems will cut your tax bill.

messages.title: CHEATED out of 500 police officers
messages.content: Labour rules lose Manchester £82,000,000 in police funds.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems plan to cut tax bills by promising extra police planning to put 3,000 officers onto the streets.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems stress that it's a two-horse race between Lib Dem John Leech and Labour, stating that local Tories have no influence with remarks like 'Can't win here' directed at the Conservative party.

leaflet.personalStatement: What's beyond doubt is that Mr Leech has proved a fantastically active MP, winning awards for campaigning on several high-profile local causes.

endorsements.endorsement: Mr Leech has proved a fantastically active MP, winning awards for campaigning on several high-profile local causes.

quotes.text: I'm backing John Leech because he led the successful fight to abolish tuition fees.
I'm voting for John Leech because he stood up for Burnage when no-one else would.
John helped me when I had nowhere else to turn.

images.caption: John Leech with police officer looking at document.
John Leech and Nick Clegg's policy promise.
